price: On reče: "Znanje o tome u Allaha je! A ja vam saopćavam ono s čime sam poslan, ali ja, doista, vidim da ste vi narod u neznanju ogrezao."
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-uballighukum mā ur'sil'tu bihi walākinnī arākum qawman tajhalūna
